name: rdw-claude-server
description: AI-powered natural language query interface for RDW Open Data (Ollama/Claude)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run local-server-duckdb" "npm run start" "npm run viewer-dev"
scripts.dev-fast: concurrently "npm run local-server-memory" "npm run start" "npm run viewer-dev"
scripts.dev-sqlite: concurrently "npm run local-server-sqlite" "npm run start" "npm run viewer-dev"
scripts.dev-csv: concurrently "npm run local-server" "npm run start" "npm run viewer-dev"
scripts.dev-claude: concurrently "npm run local-server-duckdb" "npm run start-claude" "npm run viewer-dev"
